question:
Is the following statement something you would say?
"It makes me feel uncomfortable to tell other people what to do"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"Others tend to respect and look up to me"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I tend to disapprove of those who seek power"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I struggle to feel comfortable with having power over others"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I take charge without hesitation"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"It is uncomfortable and awkward for me to be in a position of power"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I am embarrassed or uncomfortable when I have power"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I am confident in using power"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I believe power is natural and desirable"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I am secretly uncomfortable with how much power I have"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"It is uncomfortable for me to hold power over other people"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"When I aim for something, I typically get it"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"It makes me nervous to have that much power and influence"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I am decisive and commanding"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"Having power is good and it's an exhilarating feeling"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I am usually able to get others to listen to what I have to say, even if they disagree with me initially"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"Power is natural and therefore nothing to shy away from"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I am uncomfortable having influence over other people"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I do not handle increased responsibility well"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"Having power means I have greater influence"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"Having power is scary to me"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I sometimes feel uncomfortable when in a position of power"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"Power suits me just fine and I don’t have any problems with it"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I generally prefer being a leader rather than a follower"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"Power means I can get things the way I want them"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I am comfortable being in charge of others"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I don't mind commanding subordinates or telling other people what to do in general"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I get anxious at the thought of being in charge"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I am uncomfortable exercising or accepting power"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I feel comfortable being the one in charge"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I enjoy being in charge and in positions of authority"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"The more power and control that I have over other people, the more uncomfortable I feel about having power"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I am uncomfortable using power"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I get anxious around others when I have power over them"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I enjoy having power and have no trouble using it when it is appropriate"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I enjoy being in charge"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"Having power makes me feel guilty"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"Having power provides you with many opportunities you would not otherwise have"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"It feels good to be powerful"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"Having power feels weird to me"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"Power is natural and a part of life"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"Having so much power makes me uncomfortable"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I struggle with feeling insecure about having power"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"Being in charge gives me anxiety"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I do not shy away from confrontations if someone challenges my authority"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I get uncomfortable when I become too powerful"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"It would be discomforting to me to have a lot of power"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I know what needs to be done, and I am good at making tough decisions"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I cannot handle responsibility"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I am happy to be a person with influence and power as, to me, this feels natural and empowering"
